About ME

Who is Eddie Colon?

My Short Story..

When you read bio's you usually think oh man the same ole story every front end developer has ever told.. "he started coding at 8 months old".. Not the case, my family growing up was poor, we brought our first computer my 9th grade year of high school. I didnt know how to type or even search the web. If it wasnt for my friends my first email would of never been set up! Didnt take long end of 9th grade i brought a HTML book and taught myself how to make webpages using tables and sliced images from photoshop. I took a step back from web development to pursue college and sports. 2014 I fell back in love with design and frontend web development. I became addicted to learning and relearning html, scss, JavaScript, modern design and UX prototyping continued my learning React and JavaScript based technologies and Went on to create sites for several small business's and churches. When im not hacking away at the computer, I take photo's of familys weddings and seniors, and enjoy spending time with my wonderful Wife and 2 beautiful daugthers. I also work part time as a Youth pastor for Pocatello Baptist Church. Where i get to invest my time in young peoples lives

PBC & Preston Grace

FrontEnd Developer :: WebMaster

Created and designed Pocatello baptist church website, Created and maintaining Preston Grace fellowship site. Updating, maintaining and refreshing the look of the design.
